articles.description: England face Australia in day one of the Test in the Women’s Ashes – follow score updates, radio commentary and video highlights.
articles.title: Women’s Ashes 2025 LIVE: Australia vs England Test, day one, Melbourne – cricket score, radio commentary, video highlights & updates

articles.description: Transfer news latest on Aston Villa's Jhon Duran & Ollie Watkins; watch Champions League goals; plus women's football deadline day updates on Chloe Kelly & Keira Walsh
articles.title: Watch Champions League goals & reaction; transfer news latest on Duran & Watkins

articles.description: Manchester City's Champions League hopes almost went up in smoke against Club Brugge - but a big improvement is needed to make the last 16, says BBC Sport chief football writer Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Man City: Pep Guardiola needs improvement for Champions League play-offs

articles.description: A dramatic final round of Champions League games finishes and after some epic permutations for the first time we know who will be in the knockout rounds.
articles.title: Champions League: Who qualified to knockouts - and who could play who next?

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at what has and has not worked with the new Champions League format after the league phase.
articles.title: Champions League 2025: Five ways new format has transformed tournament

articles.description: Celtic's enthralling defeat at Aston Villa was a near-perfect illustration of the club's gripping, and ultimately successful, Champions League campaign.
articles.title: Champions League: Villa Park bedlam sums up gripping Celtic campaign

articles.description: Chelsea agreed an £800,000 deal for England international Keira Walsh to join on the Women's Super League's transfer deadline day.
articles.title: Keira Walsh: Chelsea agree £800,000 deal with Barcelona for England midfielder

articles.description: A much-changed Liverpool lose their 100% winning record in this season's Champions League after defeat to PSV Eindhoven in a five-goal thriller.
articles.title: PSV 3-2 Liverpool: Dutch side win thriller against Reds

articles.description: Afghanistan's female cricketers play an exhibition match at the Junction Oval in Melbourne, with the players hoping to "open doors" for women in the country.
articles.title: Afghanistan's female cricketers play historic exhibition match in Australia

articles.description: Rwanda and South Africa hope to host an African grand prix for the first time since 1993, but several expensive obstacles stand in their way.
articles.title: F1 in Africa: Rwanda and South Africa race to bring grand prix to continent
